H0.text: Where did Jonathan Edwards set his 1995 triple jump world record. United Kingdom

H1.text: Where did Jonathan Edwards set his 1995 triple jump world record. United States

H2.text: Where did Jonathan Edwards set his 1995 triple jump world record. Australia

H3.text: Where did Jonathan Edwards set his 1995 triple jump world record. SWEDEN

A4.text: Jonathan Edwards also jumped 18.16 (+1.3) in Gothenburg, Sweden on 7 August 1995.

A5.text: The male world record holder is Jonathan Edwards of the United Kingdom, with a distance of 18.29 m (60 ft 0 in).
